SEARCH
Package SC2002.Project.entity

Class Project

java.lang.Object
SC2002.Project.entity.Project
public class Project extends Object
Entity representing a BTO housing project in the system.

This class is central to the system and contains all information about a specific BTO housing project including:

  • Project details (name, neighborhood, dates)
  • Available flat types, quantities, and prices
  • Officer assignments and slot management
  • Visibility control for applicant access
  • Enquiry tracking

Fulfills the following requirements:

  • Stores complete BTO project information as required by managers
  • Tracks available units for each flat type
  • Controls project visibility to applicants
  • Manages officer assignments with slot limits
  • Maintains application opening/closing dates
  • Tracks project-specific enquiries

  • Field Details

      public static final int MAX_OFFICER_SLOTS

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(int id, String name, String neighbourhood, List<String> flatTypes, List<Integer> totalUnits, List<Double> prices, LocalDate openDate, LocalDate closeDate, Visibility visibility, int officerSlotLimit)
      Constructs a new Project with all required details. This constructor is used by managers when creating new projects.
      Parameters:
      id - unique project ID
      name - project name
      neighbourhood - neighbourhood name
      flatTypes - list of flat type names (e.g., "2-ROOM")
      totalUnits - total units per flat type
      prices - selling price per flat type
      openDate - application opening date
      closeDate - application closing date
      visibility - initial visibility (ON/OFF)
      officerSlotLimit - max number of officers (max 10)

      public boolean updateFlatTypeUnits(String flatType, int newUnits)
      Updates the number of units for a specific flat type. Part of the requirement for managers to edit project details.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to update
      newUnits - The new number of total units
      Returns:
      True if successful, false otherwise

    • addFlatType

      public boolean addFlatType(String flatType, int units, double price)
      Adds a new flat type to this project. Part of the requirement for managers to edit project details.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to add
      units - The number of units
      price - The price per unit
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if flat type already exists

    • removeFlatType

      public boolean removeFlatType(String flatType, int currentUnits)
      Removes a flat type from this project. Part of the requirement for managers to edit project details. Performs additional validation to ensure no active applications are affected without notification.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to remove
      currentUnits - The current units for reference
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if flat type not found

    • updateFlatPrice

      public boolean updateFlatPrice(String flatType, double newPrice)

      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to update
      newPrice - The new price
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if flat type not found

    • isOpen

      public boolean isOpen()
      Checks if the project is currently open for applications. This is used to determine if applicants can apply for this project.
      Returns:
      True if today is between openDate and closeDate (inclusive)

      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to check
      Returns:

    • getRemainingUnits

      public int getRemainingUnits(String flatType)
      Gets the number of remaining (available) units for a specific flat type. This is used by managers when approving applications to check if units are available.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to check
      Returns:
      Number of remaining units for the specified flat type, or 0 if not found

    • getFlatTypePrice

      public double getFlatTypePrice(String flatType)
      Gets the price for a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to check
      Returns:
      Price for the specified flat type, or 0 if not found

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if the project is currently visible to applicants. Fulfills the requirement for toggling project visibility.
      Returns:
      True if the project is marked visible

    • decrementAvailableUnits

      public boolean decrementAvailableUnits(String flatType)
      Decrements the number of available units for a specific flat type. This method should only be called by managers during the final booking approval process.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to decrement
      Returns:
      True if units were successfully decremented, false otherwise

    • incrementAvailableUnits

      public void incrementAvailableUnits(String flatType)
      Increments the number of available units for a specific flat type. Called when a booking is cancelled or withdrawn.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to increment

    • overlapsWith

      public boolean overlapsWith(Project other)
      Checks if this project's application period overlaps with another project's period. This is used to enforce the requirement that managers can only handle one project within an application period.
      Parameters:
      other - The other project to compare against
      Returns:
      True if the periods overlap, false otherwise
